      ]

i <- 7
j <- 1
rep(0, j)
sapply(1:30, FUN = function(i) {s_age[get(paste0("y", 1987:2017)[i + 1]) == i, .N]})

persist_l <- lapply(1:30, FUN = function(j) {
  c(
    sapply(1:(31 - j), FUN = function(i) {
      s_age[get(paste0("y", 1987:2017)[i + j]) == i, .N]
      }),
    rep(NA, j)
    )
  }
)

persist_l_percent <- lapply(1:30, FUN = function(j) {
  temp <- c(
    sapply(1:(31 - j), FUN = function(i) {
      s_age[get(paste0("y", 1987:2017)[i + j]) == i, .N]
      }),
    rep(NA, j)
    )
  temp <- temp / max(temp, na.rm = TRUE)
  temp
  }
)

persist_l
persist_l_percent[[6]]
persist_l[[6]] / max(persist_l[[6]], na.rm = TRUE)

# raw counts
persist_df <- data.frame(
  do.call("cbind", persist_l))
names(persist_df) <- paste0("y", 1988:2017)

persist_df <- persist_df %>%
  mutate(time_abn = 1:31) %>%
  select(time_abn, everything())

persist_long <- persist_df %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("y"), 
               names_to = "year_abn", 
               values_to = "count",
               values_drop_na = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(year_abn = as.integer(gsub("y", "", year_abn))) %>%
  select(time_abn, year_abn, count)

# plot
ggplot(data = persist_long, aes(time_abn, count)) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = time_abn, y = count,
                          group = year_abn, color = year_abn))


# ----- #

  do.call("cbind", persist_l_percent))
names(persist_percent_df) <- paste0("y", 1988:2017)

persist_percent_df <- persist_percent_df %>%
  mutate(time_abn = 1:31) %>%
  select(time_abn, everything())

persist_percent_long <- persist_percent_df %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("y"), 
               names_to = "year_abn", 
               values_to = "prop_remaining",
               values_drop_na = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(year_abn = as.integer(gsub("y", "", year_abn))) %>%
  select(time_abn, year_abn, prop_remaining)

gg_abn_decay <- ggplot(data = persist_percent_long, aes(time_abn, prop_remaining)) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = time_abn, y = prop_remaining,
                          group = year_abn, color = year_abn), 
            size = 1.25
            ) + 
  labs(y = expression("Proportion remaining abandoned (%))") , 
       x = "Years since initial abandonment", 
       title = "Land Cover Area, Shaanxi/Shanxi Provinces, China",
       color = "Year Abandoned") +
